**The Diversity-Hire Narrative in CS: Sources, Impacts, and Responses** [SIGCSE 2024]

::: {.skills}
*Christopher Perdriau, Vidushi Ojha, **Kaitlynn T. Gray**, Brent Lagesse, Colleen M Lewis*

Researched the diversity-hire narrative - the belief that someone received a job due to a part of their identity and not their skill. Explored who said this narrative, how it impacted those who heard it, and how people responded to hearing it.
:::

:::{.project-links}
[Article (PDF)](https://dl.acm.org/doi/pdf/10.1145/3626252.3630945)
[ACM Info](https://dl.acm.org/doi/10.1145/3626252.3630945)

::: {.proj-title}
**Human-Computer Interaction Researcher** - Harvey Mudd College CACTI Lab [Undergrad Summer 2024]
:::

::: {.proj-description}

*Lily Anfang, Maya Flynn, **Kaitlynn Gray**, Ethan Sandoval, Lynn Kirabo*

Published a survey poster in ASSETS '25 and a blog post in ACM's iX Interactions. Explored the intersection of disability and climate change.

**What I did:** Read/listened to over 70 academic articles, research papers, online blogs, and podcasts about climate change and disability. Summarized their findings and methods. Grouped readings by theme and identified trends. Wrote a portion of our team's iX Interactions blog post exploring imposter syndrome experienced as HCI researchers. Also designed the cute logo you see!

::: {.proj-title}
**Computer Science Education Researcher** - UIUC remote collaboration with Harvey Mudd College [Undergrad Summer 2023]
:::

::: {.proj-description}

*Christopher Perdriau, Vidushi Ojha,* ***Kaitlynn T. Gray,*** *Brent Lagesse, Colleen M Lewis*

:::

::: {.proj-description}

Published a research article in SIGCSE '24 and an abstract in ICER '23. Researched the diversity-hire narrative - the belief that someone received a job due to a part of their identity and not their skill. Explored who said this narrative, how it impacted those who heard it, and ways to prevent harmful effects from hearing this narrative. [Image source](https://blogs.illinois.edu/view/6758/663343). 

**What I did:** Qualitatively analyzed 23 interviews for themes and main ideas using SaturateApp. Proofread and edited our published paper. Presented our findings at the Harvey Mudd 2023 Summer Research Symposium. Designed the layout for the research poster under "Poster PDF".
:::

:::{.project-links}
[SIGCSE '24](https://dl.acm.org/doi/10.1145/3626252.3630945)
[ICER '23](https://dl.acm.org/doi/pdf/10.1145/3568812.3603479) 
[Poster PDF](resources/DiversityHireNarrative.pdf) 
:::

:::
